data.text: @nat_forrest I wonder how many non covid hospitalisations in the same period?

@steve_wars @nat_forrest That wont happen It would be very transparent if they did and they don’t want to be Just assume its 50/50 thise who were actually admitted because of Covid and those who teated positive after attending hospital
@nat_forrest Hi @nat_forrest , do we have the recovery numbers? That would help keep perspective around the actual increase in infections
@nat_forrest They seriously need to break down those hospital numbers.

@nat_forrest Cases and hospitalisations may be spiking but to have no one in ICU is amazing and justifies the border not reopening until last Thursday. The 4 week delay bought WA the time they needed to boost the most vulnerable. 90% of people aged 70 and up are now boosted. #covid19
